Failed to successfully launch or connect to a child MSBuild.exe process

April 8, 2015

Quick post here with a quick solution. If you have ever tried to build and got this error:

Then you are probably a bit stumped right now. Easy solution that has worked every time for me: quit Visual Studio and restart the application. Try rebuilding - you should be all set. Some people have said they needed to log out and log back in before it will work - I have not experienced that though.

Tags: VisualStudio,.NET,C#

About the Author

I am a senior .NET engineer currently working at CARDFREE building out RESTful services to supports our mobile and web apps. My focus currently is around scalability, security, and ensuring our solutions are maintainable.

Originally from Boston, but have been living in Denver for several years now. In my spare time I try to keep pace with my energentic golden, hike and ski, and occassionally post something interesting.
